data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: On Friday nights, Susie and her son like to make a big dinner and then watch a movie. They ____ buy ____ to ____ while ____ watch ____ movie, which ____ exciting ____ her ____. They ____ up ____, ____ then ____ to ____ when they're tired. Sometimes Susie picks the movie, and sometimes her son does.
data.partBlankContent: On Friday nights, Susie and her son like to make a big dinner and then watch a movie. They alw___ buy ca___ to e__ while th__ watch t__ movie, which i_ exciting f__ her s__. They st__ up la__, a__ then g_ to b__ when they're tired. Sometimes Susie picks the movie, and sometimes her son does.
data.answer: 星期五晚上，苏茜和她的儿子喜欢做一顿丰盛的晚餐，然后看电影。他们总是在看电影的时候买蛋糕吃，这让她的儿子很兴奋。他们熬夜，累了就上床睡觉。有时是苏茜选电影，有时是她儿子选。
